pageTitle: The Prime Minister Justin Trudeau Speaks with President of Mexico Enrique Peña Nieto | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, spoke today with Mexican President Enrique Peña Nieto.

The two leaders discussed the ongoing NAFTA negotiations and their shared commitment to negotiating a modernized agreement that advances North American competitiveness and benefits workers, employers and consumers in all three countries.

The Prime Minister and President also discussed recent developments on steel and aluminum trade.

The leaders agreed that they and their officials would keep in touch on these matters.
